name: Akasha Ramanna
bio: Data scientist with a passion for building interactive tools that make machine learning accessible.

projects.title: Stock Price Dashboard
projects.description: Visualizes real-time and historical stock prices with interactive charts and trend analysis.

projects.title: Text Sentiment Analyzer
projects.description: Uses NLP to analyze the sentiment of your text with detailed word frequency analysis.

projects.title: Weather Predictor
projects.description: Predicts future weather patterns based on historical data with 14-day forecasts.
